attributes.action: Save Dunningford Primary School From Closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London Borough of Havering council has announced plans to close Dunningford Primary School in August 2009 and merge the children with a nearby school. This is in total contravention of the governments objectives set out in Every Child Matters

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Dunningford Primary School From Closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20166


Prime Minister's Office
